title: 07/07/2021 - HOUR 1 - Suns, Rodgers, Chris Paul

description:
The Suns looked more comfortable in Game 1

It looks like Aaron Rodgers knows he's coming back to the Packers

If the Suns win the NBA Finals


Guest: Nick Wright
